name: Speedroid Wing Synchron
effectText: If this card is added to your Extra Deck face-up, and you control 2 or more different Types of WIND Synchro Monsters: You can send 1 "Speedroid" Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Speedroid Wing Synchron" once per turn.
pendEffect: Once per turn: You can destroy this card and 1 Level 2 WIND Pendulum Monster Card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Clear Wing Synchro Dragon" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon), also for the rest of this turn, cards in your Pendulum Zones cannot be destroyed by card effects, and you cannot Special Summon, except WIND monsters.
